about_the_game:
It's time to make love happen, again!

In Kitty Powers’ Matchmaker: Makeover, players step back into the role of a matchmaking agency manager, helping quirky clients find their true love under the expert guidance of the fabulous Kitty Powers.

This remastered version comes bursting with vibrant new artwork, expanded customization options, and a host of gameplay improvements to make matchmaking even more fun and inclusive.

Features

  • Enhanced Artwork: Feast your eyes on Matchmaker’s enhanced assets and sumptuously high definition artwork. Now with 4K and ultra-widescreen modes!

  • Expanded Customization: Players have new options to dress and style their characters, with updated personalities and fashion that ensures anything goes!

  • New Gameplay Elements: Flex your matchmaking muscles with new dating dilemmas, improved mechanics, and refined controls that make it easier to create perfect matches.
